Release.Notes:
New from 0.0.2 release: * Support for DNG, Photoshop PSD, JPEG2000 and camera raw formats * Fixed several crashes * Bugfixes
New from 0.0.1 release: * Fix default library access error on Vista/7
New from 0.0beta release: * Change online version check behaviour * UI redesign * New AnalogExif tags: Lens serial number, Film grain and Develop process * Online help * Bugfixes

New from 0.0.1 release: * Support for DNG, Photoshop PSD, JPEG2000 and camera raw formats * Handle APEX aperture tags properly (e.g. Maximum aperture) * Fixed several crashes * Bugfixes
New from 0.0beta release: * Change online version check behaviour * UI redesign * New AnalogExif tags: Lens serial number, Film grain and Develop process * Online help * Bugfixes
